name: Webex by Cisco Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Cisco Webex events occur.
natural_language_description: 这是 Webex by Cisco Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Cisco Webex events occur.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: meeting | (必填项)
available_options: [All] (值: all)
Attachment Action (值: attachmentAction)
Meeting (值: meeting)
Membership (值: membership)
Message (值: message)
Recording (值: recording)
Room (值: room)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

event.name: event
available_options: Created (值: created)
Updated (值: updated)
Deleted (值: deleted)
* (值: all)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only contain a reference to the data the user inputed. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response only contain a reference to the data the user inputed. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: hasFiles (值: None) - Whether to limit to messages which contain file content attachments
isLocked (值: None) - Whether to limit to rooms that are locked
isModerator (值: None) - Whether to limit to moderators of a room
mentionedPeople (值: None) - Limit to messages which contain these mentioned people, by person ID; accepts me as a shorthand for your own person ID; separate multiple values with commas
messageId (值: None) - Limit to a particular message, by ID
ownedBy (值: None)
personEmail (值: None) - Limit to a particular person, by email
personEmail (值: None) - Limit to a particular person, by email
personId (值: None) - Limit to a particular person, by ID
personId (值: None) - Limit to a particular person, by ID
personId (值: None) - Limit to a particular person, by ID
roomId (值: None) - Limit to a particular room, by ID
roomId (值: None) - Limit to a particular room, by ID
roomId (值: None) - Limit to a particular room, by ID
roomType (值: None) - Limit to a particular room type
type (值: None) - Limit to a particular room type
